main.name: Patrick Songco
main.bio: Analytically minded recent Computer Science graduate with a desire for knowledge and problem solving. My professional goals are to apply the understanding and methodologies I have accumulated to real world applications and continually grow my skillset in Data Science and Machine Learning.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Working on projects for both university and industry partners, I have developed the skills required for both frontend and backend development, as well as the tools to navigate the various functions and concepts required to analyse large volumes of data to discover insightful trends.

education.honours: Honours Project: Studying the effect of Graph Embedding methods on Knowledge Graph Attention Networks for Recommendation

description.fourth: 2019 Dean’s Merit List Award for Information Technology

volunteering.placement: Teaching Placement – The Sacred Valley, Peru
volunteering.description: Working alongside teachers developing lesson plans to teach English to primary school children

description.first: Currently working in the Risk and Remediation Data Science Team. Responsibilities include:
description.second: Model development, testing, deployment and documentation
description.third: Feature engineering using Natural Language Processing
description.fourth: Liasing with relevant stakeholders to obtain clean and useful data

description.first: The role involved establishing processes and implementing standards in order to provide optimum patient experience. Responsibilities include:
description.second: Driving the accreditation process by ensuring all standards are maintained consistent with RACGP and AGPAL accreditation standards
description.third: Creating SQL scripts to identify operational efficiencies and targeted patient management
description.fourth: Ensure ongoing financial control and profitability for business growth
description.fifth: Provide professional support to the practitioner and allied health professionals, including management of rostering GP’s and practice staff, appointment bookings, and billings
description.sixth: Practice billings, receivables, liaising with Medicare when required

description.first: Working with an industry partner, the role involved building and testing software to aid in Data Quality Management. Responsibilities include:
description.second: Backend and Frontend application development using a Django/React framework
description.third: Producing documentation for the usage and future development of the application
description.fourth: Collaborating with UTS and industry partner stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of our objectives
description.fifth: Providing recommendations on current research avenues to integrate a machine learning framework in future iterations of the application

description.first: As an Analytics Intern, I was able to successfully own and deliver a “Next Best Conversation” module in the Bank’s Customer Engagement Engine (CEE). This process involved:
description.second: Project initiation – requirements gathering from various stakeholders in the Bank
description.third: Analysis of targeted customer segments via SQL database queries
description.fourth: Production of project brief and details of implementation
description.fifth: Liaising with Delivery, Product, Digital, Marketing, Channels and Leadership Team to obtain required approvals
description.sixth: Project handover to Delivery for project build
description.seventh: Pre-Verification Testing and Business Verification Testing to ensure the projected customers were contacted
description.eighth: In addition, I was given the chance to present to Leaders in the organisation, network with Data Scientists to understand their scope within the context of the organisation and contribute to planning off-site events for my team

description.first: The role involves providing assistance to the Doctor in consultations as well as ensuring the smooth running of the surgery. Responsibilities include:
description.second: Opening, setting up and closing the surgery
description.third: Rapidly assessing patients to determine what level of care is needed
description.fourth: Undertaking basic examinations under supervision of the Doctor: Recording patients' blood pressure, blood glucose, INR, etc
description.fifth: Training in CPR, Triage, Infection control, and autoclave
description.seventh: Liaising with other medical practices, hospitals and pharmacies for patient
